nodes.title: II.1. Stelae and accompanying structures: Funerary and non-funerary structures
Notes
nodes.body: [39] For cultural lore about this mountain see John Vincent Bellezza, Calling Down the Gods: Spirit-Mediums, Sacred Mountains and Related Bon Textual Traditions in Upper Tibet. Tibetan Studies Library no. 8. (Leiden: Brill, 2005), 80, 298.
